Text: fillinthisspace, any chance you could seed again for awhile?  I really loved this series and appreciate you encoding it.  I will make sure to seed for quite awhile after I get a complete download (will also seed for series 3 & 4 which I am presently downloading).

nama12,
No problem. I think the whole torrent is still available but if you're still around I'll seed it again for a while just to be sure.
